name: gh
description: GitHub CLI wrapper exposing curated subcommands for repository management.

custom.default: Use --tool_args -- to pass flags exactly as you would to the gh CLI. Prefer --repo to operate on specific repositories.

subcommand.name: pr_create
subcommand.description: Create a pull request with optional draft and metadata flags.

options.name: repo
options.description: Target repository in the OWNER/REPO form.

options.name: title
options.description: Title for the pull request.

options.name: body
options.description: Markdown body content for the pull request.

options.name: base
options.description: Base branch to merge into.

options.name: head
options.description: Head branch to merge from.

options.name: draft
options.description: Create the pull request as a draft.

subcommand.name: pr_list
subcommand.description: List pull requests with flexible filtering options.

options.name: repo
options.description: Target repository in OWNER/REPO form.

options.name: state
options.description: Filter by state: open, closed, or merged.

options.name: author
options.description: Filter results to a specific author.

options.name: limit
options.description: Maximum number of pull requests to return.

subcommand.name: pr_view
subcommand.description: View detailed information about a pull request.

options.name: repo
options.description: Repository in OWNER/REPO form if not in a local git repo.

options.name: comments
options.description: Include review comments in the output.

subcommand.name: pr_close
subcommand.description: Close a pull request optionally deleting its branch.

positional_args.name: pr_selector
positional_args.description: Pull request number or URL to close.

options.name: repo
options.description: Repository in OWNER/REPO form.

options.name: delete-branch
options.description: Delete the local and remote branch after closing.

options.name: comment
options.description: Leave a closing comment for context.

subcommand.name: cache_list
subcommand.description: List GitHub Actions caches for a repository.

options.name: repo
options.description: Repository in OWNER/REPO form.

options.name: key
options.description: Filter caches matching the provided key prefix.

options.name: limit
options.description: Maximum number of caches to return.

options.name: order
options.description: Sort order for results: asc or desc.

options.name: ref
options.description: Limit caches to a specific git ref.

options.name: sort
options.description: Field to sort by such as created or last-accessed.

subcommand.name: cache_delete
subcommand.description: Delete GitHub Actions caches by key or identifier.

positional_args.name: cache_id_or_key
positional_args.description: Cache ID or key to remove.

options.name: repo
options.description: Repository in OWNER/REPO form.

options.name: all
options.description: Delete all caches that match the current filters.

options.name: succeed-on-no-caches
options.description: Exit successfully even when no caches match.

subcommand.name: run_cancel
subcommand.description: Cancel a GitHub Actions run by ID.

options.name: repo
options.description: Repository in OWNER/REPO form.

subcommand.name: run_download
subcommand.description: Download artifacts for a workflow run.

options.name: repo
options.description: Repository in OWNER/REPO form.

subcommand.name: run_list
subcommand.description: List recent workflow runs for a repository.

options.name: repo
options.description: Repository in OWNER/REPO form.

options.name: workflow
options.description: Filter to a specific workflow file name or ID.

options.name: branch
options.description: Filter runs to a specific branch.

options.name: status
options.description: Filter by status such as queued, in_progress, or completed.

options.name: limit
options.description: Maximum number of runs to return.

subcommand.name: run_view
subcommand.description: View details for a specific workflow run.

options.name: repo
options.description: Repository in OWNER/REPO form.

options.name: job
options.description: Focus output on a specific job within the run.

subcommand.name: run_watch
subcommand.description: Stream updates for a workflow run until completion.

options.name: repo
options.description: Repository in OWNER/REPO form.

subcommand.name: workflow_view
subcommand.description: View metadata for a workflow definition.

positional_args.name: workflow_selector
positional_args.description: Workflow file name or ID to view.

options.name: repo
options.description: Repository in OWNER/REPO form.

options.name: ref
options.description: Git ref used to resolve the workflow definition.

subcommand.name: workflow_list
subcommand.description: List workflows configured for a repository.

options.name: repo
options.description: Repository in OWNER/REPO form.

options.name: limit
options.description: Maximum number of workflows to list.

install_instructions: GitHub CLI (gh) is not installed. Please install it with 'brew install gh' or via https://cli.github.com/.
